text: ni ulhiviya ntwarusho wo mitheko chipannge aya. Utteka uthana mwaari phi mpuha aya, upangacha chittu chiriyoothe chinohalha utondoviha ikhwilhu chaya cho mwiiruttuni. Yayo anowuulhihani muru mwaatti vanohalha inyu waakhalhana ni waalhiana ikaramu chinyu uno ateelhiyaka wo iphiro chaya cho uhilhoka chiyo.
